title: Jeremy Kyle and Vicky Burton enjoy Barbados getaway | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now Last month, it was revealed that he had embarked on a romance with Vicky, who used to be a nanny for his three children, according to the Sunday Mirror . The pair have reportedly been dating each other for the past two months after Miss Burton spent years working for Kyle and his ex-wife Carla Germaine. A source told the newspaper: 'It's early days but he's happy. The relationship is just starting out so who knows what the future will hold?' Sunny outlook: Vicky threw on a stylish white crocheted sundress as she continued to relax Bare necessities: Shirtless Jeremy looked delighted as he basked in the glorious sunshine Jeremy, who has been hosting the show for 13 seasons since 2005, announced that he and wife were splitting in 2015. News of their break-up came after Kyle made a frank admission about the couple's sex life on his eponymous show in June 2015, while interrogating a woman about whether she'd cheated on her partner. The presenter and his wife were married for 13 years but they 'grew apart' and it was reported that Carla was caught having an affair with England polo player James Carr, 25. Cooling off: The brunette was later seen sipping an ice-cold beverage from a large wine glass The friend added that Vicky is 'loved by all the family' and that is 'no animosity' after Jeremy informed his ex-wife about his new girlfriend. Said the source: 'He's been single for a long time and deserves a bit of happiness.' Vicky - who stopped being the former couple's nanny 10 months ago - was photographed with Jeremy, his ex-wife and two of their children on a family holiday in Barbados in 2013. Happy talk: The talk show host held a cigarette as he chatted with his shapely new girlfriend Blossoming romance: Sources have said that Jeremy and Vicky started dating two months ago Jeremy, who has been married twice, was diagnosed with testicular cancer in 2012 and publicly spoke about his troubles with gambling. He has four children - a 26-year-old daughter from a previous marriage and three with Carla - Alice, 12, Ava, 11 and seven-year-old Henry. His first marriage to Kirsty Rowley ended in 1990 after a year together and the pair have a daughter called Harriet. MailOnline has contacted Jeremy Kyle's agent for comment. more videos
